메뉴
COVID-19
Tests for Diagnosis of Infectious Diseases
service

We provide molecular diagnostic solutions for infectious diseases.

Due to the global pandemic, it is essential to have an optimal test environment for prompt and accurate diagnoses. To this end, Macrogen proposes integrated
solutions for both patients and medical staff, which consist of onsite diagnostic systems with superior mobility, safety, and convenience and accurate diagnostic kits.

SERVICE

Axen™ COVID-19 RT Test Kit
  • Axen™ COVID-19 RT Test Kit
  • Macrogen Smart Mobile Lab

Axen™ COVID-19 RT Test Kit

Based on the RT-PCR (Real Time PCR), the kit is suitable for screening patients with small amounts of novel coronavirus due to its outstanding target detection. The Axen™ COVID-19
test kit has obtained export approval from the Korean Ministry of Food and Drug Safety and Europe’s In-Vitro Diagnostic (CE-IVD) to provide reliable diagnostic services.

Specifications

Item Specification
Detection target 2019-nCoV (COVID-19)
Target region ORF1ab / E gene
Detection technology Real-Time RT-PCR
Specimen type Nasal swab / Sputum
PCR run time 2 hrs
Compatible PCR device CFX96™ Real-Time PCR

Detection Target Region

  • ORF1ab

  • E gene

Process

Process

ORF1ab E gene RNase P Status Results
Positive Positive Positive Valid SARS-CoV-2 Positive
Positive Negative Positive Valid SARS-CoV-2 Positive (Repeat test, If the repeat result remains inconclusive, additional confirmation testiong should be conducted if clinically indicated.)
Negative Positive Positive Valid Near-source SARS-CoV-2 (Sample should be retested. If the result is still invalid, a new specimen should be obtained.)
Negative Negative Positive Valid SARS-CoV-2 Negative
Negative Negative Negative Invalid Repeat test, If the repeat result remains invalid, consider collecting a new specimen.

Clinical diagnosis-related service items cannot be requested personally, and inquiries through professional medical personnel are required to use the service.

Service Inquiry
Prev
Next

Macrogen Smart Mobile Lab

Smart Mobile Lab is the first-ever on-site COVID 19 testing system developed in Korea.

This is a small mobile lab for on-site testing of the virus, and it is composed of an all-in-one system that can perform the entire process, starting from the extraction of virus nucleic acid, followed by genetic testing, and then the analysis results.

Specifications

  • K-Quarantine model

  • Equipment options available depending on budget or preference

  • Power supply options available (External Power/Solar Power System)

  • Maintenance and repair service provided

  • Training for lab technicians provided (online/offline)

  • Easy installation/relocation

  • Collaboration with a company specialized in mobile labs and negative pressure wards

Ordering Information for Relative Product

Name of Kit Cat.No. BSL-Level
Smart Mobile Lab(40ft) SML01-100 BSL- 2 Level

Process

Clinical diagnosis-related service items cannot be requested personally, and inquiries through professional medical personnel are required to use the service.
